a.title: ds
a.span: WELCOME BACK 2019-2020 from Dr. Dennis Vespe

br.a: Information about receiving text messages from the school district

br.br: Información para recibir mensajes de texto del distrito escolar.

span.style: text-decoration: underline; font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: 16px;

br.h4:
Registration for New Students
For your convenience, you may now register your student(s) online using our convenient Online Registration Portal. Simply click on the link and follow the directions to complete the registration packet and upload all of your student documents.

p.a: Gloucester City High School earns a spot on the
College Board’s 7th Annual AP® District Honor Roll
for Significant Gains in Student Access and Success

br.span: n the event of inclement weather or other emergencies, our schools maybe closed for the entire day or opened two hours late. Information about emergency closings or late openings will be given on this website,
, and through our emergency phone chain system.

p.span: In an emergency, our School Code is #561

The Gloucester City School District does not discriminate in admissions or access to, or treatment, or employment on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, disability or age in its programs and activities. Contact Title IX Coordinator at 856-456-7000 ext. 1703 / Section 504 at 856-456-7000 ext. 2168
El distrito para La Ciudad de Gloucester

span.style: font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif; color: rgb(33, 33, 33);
